text: Raymond Steele Hall (30 November 1928 - 10 June 2024) was an Australian politician. He was the 36th Premier of South Australia from 1968 to 1970. He also was a senator for South Australia from 1974 to 1977, and federal member for the Division of Boothby from 1981 to 1996. Hall died on 10 June 2024 at the age of 95. ==References== ==More readings== * Felicia: The Political Memoirs of Don Dunstan, D. Dunstan (1981), MacMillan, South Melbourne. * The Flinders history of South Australia. Political history, ed. D.
